wayfarer 0.1.0
  • Reference

Get basic information about Github repo

github_repo_info.Rd

Get all repo info offered by the main type of Gihub API requests.

github_repo_info(repo.url, user = NA, repo = NA)

Arguments

user

character username
repo

character repo name

Value

List of Github repo attributes

References

For detailed info see: https://developer.github.com/v3/

Examples

github_repo_info("github.com/qinwf/awesome-r")
#> $id
#> [1] 22003158
#> 
#> $node_id
#> [1] "MDEwOlJlcG9zaXRvcnkyMjAwMzE1OA=="
#> 
#> $name
#> [1] "awesome-R"
#> 
#> $full_name
#> [1] "qinwf/awesome-R"
#> 
#> $private
#> [1] FALSE
#> 
#> $owner
#> $owner$login
#> [1] "qinwf"
#> 
#> $owner$id
#> [1] 7472151
#> 
#> $owner$node_id
#> [1] "MDQ6VXNlcjc0NzIxNTE="
#> 
#> $owner$avatar_url
#> [1] "https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/7472151?v=4"
#> 
#> $owner$gravatar_id
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $owner$url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf"
#> 
#> $owner$html_url
#> [1] "https://github.com/qinwf"
#> 
#> $owner$followers_url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf/followers"
#> 
#> $owner$following_url

#> 
#> $owner$gists_url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf/gists{/gist_id}"
#> 
#> $owner$starred_url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf/starred{/owner}{/repo}"
#> 
#> $owner$subscriptions_url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf/subscriptions"
#> 
#> $owner$organizations_url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf/orgs"
#> 
#> $owner$repos_url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf/repos"
#> 
#> $owner$events_url
#> [1] "https://api.github.com/users/qinwf/events{/privacy}"
#> 
#> $owner$received_events_url
